name: postcss-parse-atrule-events
description: postcss plugin for parsing atrule events
author: Serkan Sipahi <serkan.sipahi@yahoo.de>

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && babel src -d lib && rm -f lib/index.test.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib && node lib/index.test.js
scripts.compile: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib --watch
